data.title: Power Shot
data.info: A player who is known for taking powerful shots from outside the box.
data.playstyle: Performs power shots faster and with increased speed.
data.playstylePlus: Performs power shots much faster and with a significant increase in speed.

data.title: Dead Ball
data.info: A player who is known for being a specialist at taking set pieces.
data.playstyle: Set pieces are delivered with increased speed, curve, and accuracy. Ball trajectory preview line is longer.
data.playstylePlus: Set pieces are delivered with exceptional speed, curve, and accuracy. Ball trajectory preview line is at maximum length.

data.title: Chip Shot
data.info: A player who is known to often try to chip the goalkeeper when shooting at goal.
data.playstyle: Performs chip shots faster and with greater accuracy.
data.playstylePlus: Performs chip shots more quickly with exceptional accuracy.

data.title: Finesse Shot
data.info: A player who is known to try and place the ball when shooting at goal.
data.playstyle: Performs finesse shots faster with additional curve and improved accuracy.
data.playstylePlus: Performs finesse shots significantly faster with maximum curve and exceptional accuracy.

data.title: Power Header
data.info: A player who is known to strike with power when heading towards goal.
data.playstyle: Performs headers with increased power and accuracy.
data.playstylePlus: Performs headers with maximum power and accuracy.

data.title: Pinged Pass
data.info: A player who is known for making high speed ground passes.
data.playstyle: Passes travel faster along the ground without impacting the trapping difficulty of the receiver.
data.playstylePlus: Passes travel much faster along the ground without impacting the trapping difficulty of the receiver.

data.title: Incisive Pass
data.info: A player who is known for making defense-splitting passes for a teammate to run onto.
data.playstyle: Through Passes are more accurate, Swerve Passes are delivered with more curve, and Precision Passes travel faster to the destination.
data.playstylePlus: Through Passes are far more accurate, Swerve Passes are delivered with maximum curve, and Precision Passes travel at top speed to the destination.

data.title: Long Ball Pass
data.info: A player who is known for performing lobbed long passes to teammates.
data.playstyle: Lob and Lofted Through Passes are more accurate, travel faster, and are more difficult to intercept.
data.playstylePlus: Lob and Lofted Through Passes are even more accurate, travel faster than ever, and are far more difficult to intercept.

data.title: Tiki Taka
data.info: A player who is known for making first-time accurate and short passes.
data.playstyle: Executes difficult first-time Ground Passes with high accuracy, using backheels when contextually appropriate. Short distance Ground Passes are highly accurate.
data.playstylePlus: Executes difficult first-time Ground Passes with even greater accuracy, using backheels when contextually appropriate. Short distance Ground Passes are exceptionally accurate.

data.title: Whipped Pass
data.info: A player who is known for making high-speed whipped crosses into the box.
data.playstyle: All crosses are highly accurate, travel faster, and with more curve.
data.playstylePlus: All crosses are highly accurate, travel faster, and with more curve. Performs driven crosses with exceptional power.

data.title: First Touch
data.info: A player who is known for accurate first touch control in difficult situations.
data.playstyle: Has reduced error when trapping the ball and is able to transition to dribbling faster with greater control.
data.playstylePlus: Has minimal error when trapping the ball and is able to transition to dribbling much faster with greater control.

data.title: Flair
data.info: A player who is known to try flamboyant moves (traps, passes, and shots).
data.playstyle: Fancy passes and shots are performed with improved accuracy. Performs Flair animations when contextually appropriate.
data.playstylePlus: Fancy passes and shots are performed with even greater accuracy. Performs Flair animations when contextually appropriate.

data.title: Press Proven
data.info: A player who is known for keeping ball possession under physical pressure from the opponent.
data.playstyle: Keeps close control of the ball while dribbling at jog speed and can shield the ball more effectively from stronger opponents.
data.playstylePlus: Keeps exceptionally close control of the ball while dribbling at jog speed. Can shield the ball much more effectively from stronger opponents.

data.title: Rapid
data.info: A player who is known to use speed and knock the ball ahead of their opponent to beat them whilst dribbling.
data.playstyle: Reaches a higher sprint speed while dribbling and has reduced chance of an error when sprinting or performing knock-ons.
data.playstylePlus: Reaches even higher sprint speed while dribbling and has greatly reduced chance of an error when sprinting or performing knock-ons.

data.title: Technical
data.info: A player who regularly tries to beat an opponent by using technical dribbling ability (with little to no use of skill moves or little to no physical contact).
data.playstyle: Reaches a higher speed when performing Controlled Sprint and performs wide turns while dribbling with more precision.
data.playstylePlus: Reaches even higher speed when performing Controlled Sprint and performs wide turns while dribbling with greater precision.

data.title: Trickster
data.info: A player who is known for being able to perform skill moves in 1v1 situations.
data.playstyle: Grants the ability to perform unique flick Skill Moves.
data.playstylePlus: Grants the ability to perform more unique ground and flick Skill Moves. Is significantly more agile when strafe dribbling.

data.title: Block
data.info: A player who is known for performing elastic and overreaching blocks.
data.playstyle: Increased reach when performing blocks and improved ability to make a successful block.
data.playstylePlus: Even greater reach when performing blocks and improved ability to make a successful block.

data.title: Bruiser
data.info: A player who is known for winning possession by physical imposition.
data.playstyle: Greater strength when performing physical tackles.
data.playstylePlus: Even greater strength when performing physical tackles.

data.title: Intercept
data.info: A player who is known for performing interceptions and keeping ball possession.
data.playstyle: Increased reach and improved chances of retaining possession of the ball when performing interceptions.
data.playstylePlus: Even greater reach and improved chances of retaining possession of the ball when performing interceptions.

data.title: Jockey
data.info: A player who is known for being successful in 1-on-1 situations.
data.playstyle: Increased max speed of Sprint Jockey and improved transition speed from jockey to sprint.
data.playstylePlus: Increased max speed of Sprint Jockey and greatly improves transition speed from jockey to sprint.

data.title: Slide Tackle
data.info: A player who is known for often performing slide tackles.
data.playstyle: Grants the ability to stop the ball directly at their feet when performing a slide tackle.
data.playstylePlus: Greatly improved slide tackle coverage. Also grants the ability to stop the ball directly at their feet when performing a slide tackle.

data.title: Anticipate
data.info: A player who is known for having a high success rate getting ball possession on tackles with a low fouling rate.
data.playstyle: Improved chances of standing tackle success and grants the ability to stop the ball directly at their feet when performing a standing tackle.
data.playstylePlus: Significantly improved chances of standing tackle success and grants the ability to stop the ball directly at their feet when performing a standing tackle.

data.title: Acrobatic
data.info: A player who tends to perform acrobatic passes, clearances, and shots.
data.playstyle: Performs volleys with improved accuracy and has access to acrobatic volley animations.
data.playstylePlus: Performs volleys with significant accuracy and has access to unique acrobatic volley animations.

data.title: Aerial
data.info: A player who is known for having a high success rate winning aerial battles in both offense and defense.
data.playstyle: Performs higher jumps and has improved aerial physical presence.
data.playstylePlus: Performs even higher jumps and has greatly improved aerial physical presence.

data.title: Trivela
data.info: A player who is known for passing, crossing, and shooting with the outside of the foot.
data.playstyle: Contextually triggers "outside of the foot" passes and shots.
data.playstylePlus: Contextually triggers "outside of the foot" passes and shots. Reduced error on "outside the foot" passes.

data.title: Relentless
data.info: A player who is known for covering a greater area of the field compared to other players in the same position.
data.playstyle: Reduces fatigue loss during play and increases fatigue recovery during halftime.
data.playstylePlus: Greatly reduces the long-term fatigue effects on attributes, reaction time, and defensive awareness. Reduces fatigue loss during play and significantly increases fatigue recovery during halftime.

data.title: Quick Step
data.info: A player who is known to have a quick burst of speed when accelerating on and off the ball.
data.playstyle: Accelerates faster during Explosive Sprint.
data.playstylePlus: Accelerates significantly faster during Explosive Sprint.

data.title: Long Throw
data.info: A player who is known to throw the ball further than the average player.
data.playstyle: Performs throw-ins with increased power to cover a greater distance.
data.playstylePlus: Performs throw-ins with more power to cover maximum distance.

data.title: Far Throw
data.info: Goalkeeper can target players further away with thrown passes.
data.playstyle: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players will have increased reach and handling closer to the end of the match.
data.playstylePlus: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players will have greatly increased reach and handling closer to the end of the match.

data.title: Footwork
data.info: Goalkeeper will perform saves with their feet more frequently.
data.playstyle: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players will have increased reactions and speed in 1-on-1 situations.
data.playstylePlus: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players will have greatly increased reactions and speed in 1-on-1 situations.

data.title: Cross Claimer
data.info: Goalkeeper will try to intercept a cross if they can get to it slightly before the opponent.
data.playstyle: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players will have increased reflexes and reactions during opposing set pieces.
data.playstylePlus: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players will have significantly increased reflexes and reactions during opposing set pieces.

data.title: Rush Out
data.info: Goalkeeper is more aggressive when coming out of the box to gather over-the-top balls or long through balls.
data.playstyle: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players will have increased speed when running.
data.playstylePlus: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players will have greatly increased speed when running.

data.title: Far Reach
data.info: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) exclusive.
data.playstyle: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players are more effective at saving shots from outside the box with increased reach and jumping.
data.playstylePlus: BAG (Be a Goalkeeper) players are significantly more effective at saving shots from outside the box with greatly increased reach and jumping.

data.title: Deflector
data.info: A goalkeeper who is known for having great deflection control to safer spaces.
data.playstyle: Performs deflection saves into safer areas with increased ball speed control.
data.playstylePlus: Performs deflection saves into safer areas or towards free teammates with greater ball speed control.
